lines.text: Maybe... there's a bunch of <c=#FF0000>Portable Holes</c> inside his blood vessels, so...
...y'know, the blood would pass through the spots where you'd check for a pulse, without any... pressure?
Kid, what're you even talkin' about?
It's simple! His blood vessels are just a bunch of holes that don't stretch and pulse like flesh!
So, if we checked for a pulse, it wouldn't show up, even though his blood was flowing!
That's some real outside-the-box thinkin', but...
He also ain't breathin'. Which explains the lack of pulse a lot neater.
